A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Poor plot\, bad acting\, and a strong social justice warrior agenda cripple this movie. Bombs dropping in space\, spaceships running out of gas and then losing their momentum\, a pointless side plot that ends with nothing\, and a cynical\, weak Luke Skywalker.

None of the big questions from the force awakens have satisfying answers.

Oh\, and apparently Carrie Fisher is Marry Poppins.
